data.text:
@KevinCore Hello Kevin, 
We apologize once again for the delay. You will be contacted by email as soon as possible.
We kindly request you to wait.
Thank you.
@AinhoaGonzlez Hello Ainhoa, can you please provide us the refund request number? For security reasons, we suggest you do so by private message. Thank you.

@da_mn_gi_na_ Olá doja, deverá apresentar a sua reclamação através do nosso site - https://t.co/6xRkSKdkjm. Caso exista mais alguma questão em que possamos ajudar, não hesite em contactar-nos. Obrigada.

urls.title: Reclamação – Como podemos ajudar? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: Queremos que tenha a melhor experiência TAP. Indique-nos a situação para que a possamos solucionar ou consulte o estado de uma reclamação já efetuada.

data.text: @zecaribeiro7 Olá! Informamos que respondemos através de mensagem direta. Obrigada

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text:
@beneaththesur11 Hello,

can you inform us through DM your complaint file number and email address related? Thank you.

@chiara_libardi Hello Chiara,
In order to assist you, please provide us the booking reference and/or the ticket number.  
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.   
Thank you.

@WilbaCastello Olá Wilba, 
De forma a verificarmos a situação, indique-nos por favor o endereço de email utilizado para a submeter. 
Por questões de confidencialidade, indique-nos os dados por mensagem privada. 
Obrigado.
@mireiallosas Hello Mireua, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@michellewelch05 Hi! We have replied to your DM. Thank you
@_jimdw_ @UK_CAA Hello Jim, we apologize for the delay and inform you that we have replied via private message. Thank you.

data.text:
@michele7ago Olá Michele, 
Informamos que já respondemos à sua mensagem privada.  
Permanecemos ao dispor. 
Obrigado.

@EdwardVernon12 Hello Edward,
We present our most sincere apologies for all inconveniences caused.
In order to assist you, please provide us the lost luggage claim file reference. 
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.   
Thank you.

@citizenofAgloe Olá Tati, 
Poderia nos indicar por favor se chegou a apresentar uma reclamação à sua chegada ao aeroporto e assim informar-nos o seu número de processo de perda de bagagem (PIR).
Por razões de privacidade, sugerimos o envio por mensagem privada.   
Obrigado.
@TedRich99 Again Ted, we can't give you a reply time through this channel, but you'll have a reply by email as soon as possible. Thank you
@TedRich99 Ted, it's not possible to provide you with a reply date but it will be as brief as possible. Thank you

@tvdsky Olá @tvdsky, pedimos que nos indique o seu código de reserva e/ou número de bilhete, para verificar. Por questões de confidencialidade, indique-nos os dados por mensagem direta. Agradecemos desde já a informação.
@superangrydude Hello bobby joe, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.

data.text:
@Feminist2DaBone Hello Vesselina, we apologize for the delay on our reply which is due to a higher number of requests currently received.
We inform you that the situation was forwarded, we kindly aks you to wait for our contact. Thank you.
@itsmeadiesel Hello ilenia, we suggest that you keep an eye on our website and social media. 😉 ✈️

@JulienCoulaud Hello Julien, we apologize for the delay on our reply and communication difficulties experienced these are due to a higher number of requests currently received.
If assistance is still needed, please contact us via private message so we may verify. Thank you.
@TedRich99 You'll receive a reply by email as briefly as possible, Ted. Thank you
@euluisgiron Olá euluisgiron, respondemos ao seu comentário por mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@nicolemho_ Olá nicole, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@luziosousa Hello LSOUSA, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@13thi @13thi Hello Thiago, we replied to your direct message. Thank you.
@PalomaMtnezP Hello Paloma we apologize for the delay and inform you that we have replied to your private message.  Thank you.
Deste modo, passageiros com partida ou destino a aeroportos em território Brasileiro deverão ter máscara facial para este efeito. 2/2

USO OBRIGATÓRIO DE MÁSCARA NOS AEROPORTOS DO BRASIL  
Com efetividade a 25NOV22, a nova resolução da ANVISA decreta que é obrigatório o uso de máscara facial no interior dos terminais, meios de transporte e outros estabelecimentos na área aeroportuária. 1/2
Therefore, passengers departing from or arriving to airports in Brazilian territory must have a face mask for this purpose. 2/2

Mandatory use of face mask at Brazilian airports

As of November 25th, the new ANVISA resolution decrees a face mask must be worn within the terminals, means of transport and other establishments within the area of the airport. 1/2
@Midnightmanu0 Hi Manuela, we've replied to your DM. Thank you
@VanyaSousa2 @belliebede Olá Vânia, trata-se de um número grátis.
@lusitane77 @UFCquechoisir Bonjour Winnie, nous nous excusons pour ce délai et vous informons que nous avons répondu a votre message privé. Merci.
@lemisbae Hi, we've replied to your DM. Thank you
@Nemi71892308 Hi Nemi, how can we help you through this channel? What are your questions? Please inform us through DM. Thank you
@TedRich99 Hi Ted, your complaint is still under analysis and it will be replied to by email as soon as possible. Thank you

@ViMa72042524 @vima72042524 Hallo, wir bedauern die Situation und möchten uns für die entstandenen Unannehmlichkeiten entschuldigen.  Können Sie uns zur Überprüfung die Buchungsnummer mitteilen? Aus Sicherheitsgründen empfehlen wir den Versand per privater Nachricht. Vielen Dank.

@justinestrand1 Hello Justine,
We inform you that we have answered your private messages. Thank you

@FilipaS75546895 Olá Filipa,
Informamos que respondemos às suas mensagens privadas. Obrigada
@BrunoPint041 Disponha sempre, Bruno 🙂✈️

@LisaReidmiller Hello Lisa,

can you inform us through private message your booking reference or electronic ticket number (047...) so we may verify? Thank you.
@grilljanne For security reasons, we kindly request that you send us the details through a private message. Thank you (2/2)

@grilljanne Hello Jonas,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to the high amount of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. In order for us to be able to check about your question, we kindly request that you provide us with the booking reference. (1/2)

@LabradorInma Hello Inma,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. If you wish to have assistance, please provide us the booking reference. For security reasons, we kindly request that you send us the information through a private message. Thank you

data.text: @MartaAcacio Olá! Informamos que respondemos à mensagem que nos enviou. Obrigada

@ChocoVL Hello Fernando,
We have already replied to your DM.

@SandraSamfly Dès que possible vous serez contacté. 
Pour quelque autre question, nous sommes à votre disposition. Merci  ✈️ (2/2)

@SandraSamfly Bonjour Sandra,
Nous comprenons votre mécontentement et sommes vraiment désoles pour la situation. En raison du nombre élevé de demandes reçues au cours des derniers mois, toutes les procédures sont considérablement retardées. (1/2)
@oaruom_ oaruom, if you are not able to complete the booking on the website, you can do it through this channel or by calling our contact center.
@BrunoPint041 Olá Bruno, não temos indicação de que haja perturbações nos voos a operar após os dias 8 e 9 de Dezembro. Podemos ajudar com mais alguma questão?
@oaruom_ Hello Oaruom, can you please provide us the itinerary, date of flight and passenger's names? For security reasons, we suggest you do so by private message. Thank you.
@nnmmrt Hello Marta, we are sorry for the late answer. Can you please provide us the complaint number? For security reasons, we suggest you do so by private message. Thank you.

@mrworldview Hello Alex, we are sorry for the late answer. Your complaint is under analysis, so you will be contacted by email as soon as possible. If you have any other questions we can help you with, feel free to contact us. Thank you.

@Juninhopharm Se a sua questão é relacionada com uma reserva, pedimos que nos indique o seu código de reserva e/ou número de bilhete. 
Por questões de confidencialidade, indique-nos os dados por mensagem privada. Obrigado. (2/2)

@Tibchaton Hello Chaton,
all claims submitted will be analyzed and you will be contacted as soon as possible with an official answer. Thank you

@jpsoares Olá João,
A TAP não tem permissão para alterar bilhetes de agência a mais de 48 horas do voo original. Deverá contatar a sua agência de viagens para alterar o bilhete que, caso necessite de alguma informação ou assistência adicional, deverá contatar o nosso Helpdesk de Agências.

@nathalyibg @justinestrand1 Hello Nathaly,
We have checked and inform that we have already answered your questions. Thank you

@Klaas44867842 Hello Klaas, we are sorry for the late answer. Your complaint is under analysis, so you will be contacted by email as soon as possible. If you have any other questions we can help you with, feel free to contact us. Thank you.

@polovina12 Olá polovina, 
Informamos que já respondemos à sua mensagem privada.  
Permanecemos ao dispor. 
Obrigado.

@IsabelleFeliu Hello Isabelle, we are sorry for the late answer. You may present your complaint and the expenses receipts on our complaints form - https://t.co/bwFSKNcRTz. If you have any other questions we can help you with, feel free to contact us. Thank you.

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so that we may resolve it or consult the status of an existing complaint.

data.text:
@reginaduartee_ Hola Regina,

nos podía informar, por mensajem privado, su código de reserva o número de billete electrónico (047...), para que podamos verificar, por favor? Gracias.

@LittleLJ1980 Hello Laura,

can you inform us through private message your complaint file number and email address related so we may verify? Thank you.

@Hoornsevaart @frankrafale Hello Hoornse, 
We kindly ask you to inform us on how can we help you and, if that's the case, please let us know your booking reference or ticket number so that we are able to help you more promptly. Thank you.

entity.name: WhatsApp
entity.description: WhatsApp Messenger, or simply WhatsApp, is an internationally available American freeware, cross-platform centralized instant messaging and voice-over-IP service owned by Meta Platforms.

data.text:
@FelidaeBenjamin Hello Felida,
We have already answered to your private messages. Thank you

@panagos770 Hello Panagos,

your flight on the 7th should not be affected by the strike that is estimated to happen on the 8th and 9th December. Thank you.

@Wsy_Freedom Hello WS,

We apologize for the late reply. We are still analyzing your query and this process might take some time. We kindly ask you to wait for our feedback, which will be made as soon as possible. Thank you for understanding.

@gastlydasilva24 Gastly,

we cannot proceed and manage a booking that was not issued with us directly. In case the agency requires assistance they can contact our agency's help desk if needed. Thank you.

@marmuct Hola marmuct,

nos podría informar, por mensaje privado, su código de reserva o número de billete electrónico (047...), para que podamos verificar, por favor? Gracias.
